Aims : To investigate effect regular irregular meal pattern energy expenditure , energy intake , , Glucose profile subjective appetite healthy normal weight woman . Experimental protocol method : Normal weight woman ( BMI 18.5-25 ) otherwise healthy study early phase menstrual cycle ( first week ) . Subjects initially screen complete 7 day food diary participating study last total 6 week . During first 2 week participant adopt one two meal pattern , follow two-week washout period habitual diet meal pattern , undertake second 2-week intervention follow second meal pattern . The meal pattern 1 ) regular - 6 daily meal snack 2 week , 2 ) irregular - different number ( 3 9 ) meals/snacks every day .
